name: Jack Norris
title: Software Developer | Web Enthusiast | Lifelong Learner
about: Hello! I'm a passionate developer with a love for creating clean, efficient, and beautiful web applications. I specialize in the MERN stack and enjoy tackling challenging problems.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A MERN application that pulls in live cyrptocurrency pricing and other data. The app allows a user to login so they can like and save their favorite coins to keep track of them.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: An PWA e-commerce site utilizing Stripe for payment.
